code: import React,{useState}from"react";import Chessboard from"chessboardjsx";import{Chess}from'chess.js';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[game,setGame]=useState(new Chess());const makeAIMove=async()=>{const res=await fetch("/api/move",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({fen:game.fen()})});const data=await res.json();game.move(data.move);setGame(new Chess(game.fen()));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{textAlign:"center"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Chess AI"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Chessboard,{width:500,position:game.fen(),onDrop:_ref=>{let{sourceSquare,targetSquare}=_ref;let move=game.move({from:sourceSquare,to:targetSquare,promotion:"q"});if(move)setGame(new Chess(game.fen()));}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:makeAIMove,children:"AI Move"})]});}export default App;
